history.narrative: Law 1-39, the “Community Development Act of 1975,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-135, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Urban Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on August 5, 1975, and September 9, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 9, 1975, it was assigned Act No. 1-135 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
